section.div: Engaging Young Minds Through Projects and Partnerships

span.span: Academics
Every child deserves a vibrant and well-rounded education.
Why Enterprise?
Learn more about our child-centered approach.
Partnerships
We look to partners to expand students’ horizons.
Enroll
Parents, partners, or the public, we’d love to hear from you.

section.class: content-container news1-container slick-container content-size-small orientation-horizontal thumbnail-orientation-vertical

div.div: ECS believes in learning that is both data-driven and meaningful for our students and their families. Each student is individually assessed so we can set and achieve personalized goals.

Welcome to our school! We believe that parent participation is key to student success; our new website is designed to provide parents with all the information they need to be active participants in their student’s education.

Our mission is "Engaging Young Minds Through Projects and Partnerships." With engaging classroom activities and partnerships with outside organizations, we seek to provide meaningful learning experiences for our children.

Welcome to our school! We are so pleased to welcome our new students as well as our returning students. We have made many recent improvements to our campus and we continue to expand our extra-curricular programs to ensure that all students may make the most of their time and explore a broad variety of interests.

div.div: We will be holding a Zoom webinar for the ECS BoT meeting

h3.a: Public comment for District-Wide Safety Plan

div.div: Per new NYSED rules, our new District-Wide Safety plan is open for review and comment from December 9th through January 10th. Click the title above to review it.

h3.a: The year is in full swing

div.div: Our students are nearing the end of the first quarter already!

span.span: Caring for the Whole Child
Our top priority is creating a safe place for kids to learn and grow.
Data-driven
We never stop looking for ways help understand our students and help them learn.
Family focused
We work closely with families, because they are the most important factor for a child's success.
Expanding Horizons
We leverage the arts to develop students' creativity and thinking skills.
Commitment to Diversity
We create opportunity and joy when we explore and share our cultures and perspectives.
21st Century
We use technology throughout our curriculum to prepare children to participate in modern workforce.
